subject: Investing
title: Building Your Personal Risk Policy
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Building Your Personal Risk Policy.

hook.text: A couple disagreed on risk until they wrote a one-page investment policy. Arguments stopped overnight.

buildup.text: A risk policy states your target allocation, rebalancing rules, and what you'll do in a crash.

discovery.text: Writing decisions in advance removes emotion from the moment they matter most.

twist.text: Without a written policy, every dip becomes a debate and every rally becomes a temptation.

climax.text: Professional institutions manage billions with investment policy statements. You should have one too.

punchline.text: A one-page plan beats a thousand emotional decisions.

quiz.question: What should a personal risk policy include?
options: Target allocation, rebalancing rules, and crisis plan
Only a list of favorite stocks
